Description: Hohner G2T Headless Steinberger Licensed 6-String Black Electric Guitar Item Description:You are bidding on a previously owned and in good working condition Hohner G2T Headless guitar. This auction is for the guitar and gig bag you see pictured. No trem bar is included. Nothing else is included. It comes as pictured. Please take a moment to look at the pictures and get a better idea of what you are bidding on. One of the pots is a little scratchy when adjusted. The electronics all work with no other issues. One of the plastic borders around the neck pickup is cracked. There are some rust on the screws. There are scuffs and scratches on the body from use. There are a couple small dings at the top edge of the neck near where the strings go in. The neck is straight. The frets have normal wear. The bag has some fraying and holes from wear and use.
